data.description: Slide OneReady to be a QuinStreeter? Reach Your Potential on the QS Team You are creative, passionate, and intellectually curious. Where others see obstacles, you see opportunities. When others talk about problems, you focus on creating solutions. If your entrepreneurial mindset drives you to succeed, you're what we're looking for in future employees! QuinStreet cultivates a work environment built on teamwork, drive, growth, recognition, and fun. Check out our job listings and find out what a future on the QS Team could mean for you! Remote/HybridCulture Employee StockPurchase Plan Maternal/PaternalBenefits Flexible VacationPolicy Health/Dental/VisionCoverage LeadershipDevelopment CompetitiveSalaries Home OfficeStipend Continuing EducationPrograms 401K RetirementPlan Employee ResourceGroups Mental HealthPrograms Employee Spotlight There is no “average” employee here. We all come from different backgrounds, which is one of our greatest strengths. It allows us to see things from new perspectives and listen to each other with open minds. Slide 1PardeepData Scientist “At QuinStreet, I enjoy collaborating with my team members and stakeholders to solve complex business problems. With the support of my manager, I have learned how to share complex machine-learning concepts and project findings with stakeholders in a way that helps them make practical suggestions on code improvements. Overall, QuinStreet has supported me improving my technical and communication skills.” Slide 3RoeProduct Designer “I started working at QuinStreet at the beginning of the pandemic. One could assume that it'd be challenging to cultivate a company culture given the circumstances; however, the culture is one of my favorite things about working at QuinStreet; I love working with a diverse group of people. Company events and freebies do not lack, but more importantly, QuinStreet fosters growth and development. In summary, QuinStreet's culture isn't just about fun; it is about caring for its employees.” Slide 4LukeTeam Lead, Mid-Market Account Management "In my career, I've never worked with such a talented and driven group of people that truly want to help you succeed. Modernize continually accelerates my career path by creating new positions to address the needs of the business and giving me opportunities to take on additional responsibilities within the organization. Not long after I was hired as a Regional Account Manager two years ago, I was promoted to the Mid-Market division and the title of Senior Mid-Market Account Manager. Now I am the Team Lead for Mid-Market Account Management. I'm proud to be part of such an amazing team!" One of the largest and most successful online performance marketing companies in the world.
